title: Augmented Reality-Based Campus Plant Learning: A Competency Development Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Smartphone Operation Skills and Fundamental Knowledge of Botany
context.additional_context: Learners can engage in self-directed learning via mobile devices on weeknights and weekends; field learning is mandatory when utilizing AR content

learning_goals: Learners can explain the morphological characteristics and ecological roles of 50 campus plant species with over 80% accuracy using AR technology.
Learners can collect and analyze plant observation data via mobile learning tools and submit weekly reports through the LMS.
Learners can develop plant learning design plans applicable to local school settings through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
